## auth.UserMetadataRequest interface

User metadata to include when importing a user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface UserMetadataRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [creationTime](./firebase-admin.auth.usermetadatarequest.creationtime.md) | string | The date the user was created, formatted as a UTC string. |
|  [lastSignInTime](./firebase-admin.auth.usermetadatarequest.lastsignintime.md) | string | The date the user last signed in, formatted as a UTC string. |
